title: Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier, 1 gallon, Black; low tank indicator; Dish washer safe; Humidity capacity: 142ml/h; Aroma tray; 3 speeds; mechanical knob; covers 320 sq. ft. area, weight: 6.33 lbs
descriptions:
**Breathe Easy with the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier**

Are you tired of dry air and congestion? Introducing the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier, a reliable and efficient solution to bring relief to your home. This 1-gallon humidifier is perfect for small to medium-sized rooms, covering an impressive 320 square feet of space.

**Experience the Power of Cool Mist Technology**

Our humidifier uses evaporative technology to create a soothing cool mist that adds moisture to the air, helping to alleviate dry skin, congestion, and sinus pressure. With an impressive humidity capacity of 142ml/h, you can enjoy a comfortable and healthy indoor environment.

**Aromatherapy at Your Fingertips**

The built-in aroma tray allows you to enjoy your favorite essential oils, promoting relaxation and well-being. Simply add a few drops of your preferred oil to the tray, and the humidifier will diffuse it into the air, creating a calming atmosphere.

**Convenience and Ease of Use**

The Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier features a mechanical knob with 3-speed settings, allowing you to adjust the mist output to your liking. The low tank indicator ensures you never run out of water unexpectedly, and the dishwasher-safe design makes cleaning a breeze. Plus, with empty tank protection, you can enjoy peace of mind knowing your humidifier will automatically shut off when the tank is empty.

**Key Features:**

* 1-gallon tank capacity
* Cool mist evaporative technology
* Aroma tray for essential oils
* 3-speed settings with mechanical knob
* Low tank indicator and empty tank protection
* Dishwasher-safe design
* Covers 320 square feet of space
* Weight: 6.33 lbs

**Upgrade Your Indoor Air Quality Today**

Don't let dry air hold you back any longer. Order the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier today and start enjoying a healthier, more comfortable indoor environment.
